text:
Ro: Hey guys, it’s Ro! Today I’m here
with my friend Max.
Max: What’s up baby? Let’s go!

Ro: We hit each others hands, that’s our
new handshake! Max: That was nice! Yes!

Ro: Max just got back from tour. Max: Mmhmm.
Ro: And you’re gonna be here for

Ro: a little bit and then you’re leaving
again. Max: Yeah, yeah!

Max: Yeah, doing another tour with this band
R5 for a couple weeks on the east

Max: coast. Ro: Oh! Max: Then putting out
this album in April, so I’m excited

Max: hope people like it! Ro: I’m so excited! I love
his music! Max: Thank you!

Ro: I’m gonna put all his links down below,
and he posts the best pictures when

Ro: he’s on tour on Instagram. Max: Thanks
babe! Ro: It’s fun to follow!

Max: I love your photos too! Ro: Are you ready
for a challenge today?
Max: I’m ready for a challenge!

Ro: OK, we got so many requests to play the
blindfolded drawing challenge game!

Ro: The rules to play this game if you’ve
never played it before are pretty simple.

Ro: We are gonna be on a team, so we are not
trying to out-do each other,

Ro: it’s kind of more like heads up, you’re
gonna be drawing an image blindfolded

Ro: and it’s my job to guess it. Max: Mmmhmm.
Ro: If we do it together,

Ro: we get a point. There’s gonna be 10
subjects to draw, you’re

Ro: gonna draw 1/2, I’m gonna draw 1/2.
And, we get 20 seconds, I’m gonna
Ro: time it on my phone to draw our image.
Ro: On a scale of 1-10, how artistic are you?

Max: Fhew, -3 for visual art for sure! Ro:
Me too! Max: Great, we’re gonna be great!

Ro: This is team RoMax! Max: RoMax! Ro: It’s
happening!

Ro: It’s like Baymax, but it’s better!
Max: RoMax! Ro: Yes!

Ro: Max is up first, so first, choose your
weapon!

Max: Oh I’m getting that purple on! Mmmm!
Ah! Ro: These are smelly good markers,

Ro: remember these? Max: Yeah! Grape, love
it! Ro: Smells like childhood, and

Ro: now, you’re gonna choose your word,
and I’m not gonna look, honor system!
Max: Oh yeah, I got that.

Ro: Go! 20 seconds on the clock! Max: Alright,
here we go!

Max: Oh my gosh, I don’t even know if I’m
connecting. Ro: Things are connecting!

Ro: I’m seeing it, it’s coming together.
Max: I’m hoping that this is here…

Max: OK. OK… Ro: Looking great! Looking
great!
Max: Uhhhh… Ro: 4, 3, 2, 1!

Max: Oh man… Hah! OK, I didn’t miss too,
too terribly!

are there! It’s all there!
Ro: Max! What is this?

Ro: Maybe it’s a cloud? With rain? Max:
Huh…. It’s a guitar.

Ro: Oh! Max: So this is, I couldn’t see
anything, so this is the base of it,

Max: and then this part is the neck of the
guitar, and these 6 little things…

Ro: Those, those are the tuners! Max: Yeah,
the tuners, and then these are the

Max: 4 strings. That’s about it. Ro: I’m
gonna frame it and keep it forever!
Max: Mmmhmmm!

Ro: Got my trusty pink pen and now I’m gonna
draw.

Ro: Don’t look Max! Don’t look Max! Max:
I’m not looking, I’m not looking!

Ro: I’m getting ready for some art! Max:
Wooo! Ro: Yeah!

Ro: Speed art, let’s do it! Max: Let’s
go! Ready?
Ro: Blindfolded speed art! Max: Start now!
Ro: Reeewwwwp! And reawwwwww! And then wooooop!

Ro: Uh, uh! Max: Is that it? Are you done?
Ro: Uh! Max: Is there more?

Ro: I could color it in! Max: Uh oh! Maybe
not, maybe that’s gonna make it worse!
Max: Wait, no, no, no! There you’re done!
Ro: Wait wait! Oh I’m done?
Ro: Wait, but just, let me just... OK! Max: OK!
Ro: OK!
Max: Beautiful! Beautiful!

Max: I’m gonna go for it! I’m gonna say
it’s earth! Is it earth?
Ro: Yes!
Ro: Planet Earth! Point for us! Max: Woo-hoo-hoo!

Ro: That’s our first point! Max: That’s
a good, that’s a good point!

Max: This is all of earth! Ro: That’s a,
that’s the whole earth!

Max: Kids, if you’re learning geography
right now, there you go!
Max: You ready?

Ro: Yep, I’m not looking! OK! Max: Here
we go! Ro: What is it?

Ro: Go! Max: OK, get it going! Get it going!
Ro: Go! Go! Go!

Max: Let’s get it going! Let’s get it
going! Ro: You’ve got it Max!

Max: I’m going! Ro: You draw that art! Max:
Oh yeah!

Ro: That looks great! Max: I’m using the
finger method, I don’t know where I’m at!
Ro: Don’t worry! Max: Oh no! Oh no!

Ro: It’s got arms! Just feel the drawing. You have... 
5 Seconds! Max: I feel it, I feel it... And theres…

Max: Oh! That wasn’t as bad as I thought!
Ro: Oh!

Ro: Yeah! Look at that! Max: It looks like
the little doody emoji!
Max: But it’s not!

Ro: You know what? I’m gonna go out on a
limb and say that this is a snowman!

Ro: This is adorable, one, I love it! OK?

Max: Let me explain, let me get into, let me
get you in the head.

Max: So uh, this is snow. Ro: Uh-huh. Max:
Penguins like snow.

Ro: I got the snow! 1/2 a point! I got the
snow! Max: So you did get that part!

Max: And then uh, 1/2 a point for the snow!
These are his little legs,
Max: they don’t happen to be off his body.

Max: They look like he had a little bit too
much to eat in penguin land. Ro: Yeah.

Max: And his body goes below his legs. But
I just thought like, oh he’s got a

Max: head and then they get a little fat,
but they don’t get that fat,
Max: so… I could see why you’d think its a snowman.

Ro: Alright, it’s gonna be tough to top
that. Max: I know, I know!

Ro: That was the best looking penguin I’ve
seen. Max: I know! Oof!

Ro: Don’t look, don’t look! Max: Honor
system!

Ro: Oh my goodness! Max: You ready to go?
Ro: OK, like, this is very specific. Max: Mmmmhmmm.
Ro: If I can’t draw this blindfolded.
Ro: I used to see this almost every day! Max: What can you do?
Ro: I’m gonna turn it this way. Max: Ohh-hoo-hoo!
Max: Start!

Ro: Herrr-bew-bew-bew! And then that, and
then this! Max: Oh whoa!
Ro: Gotta get it perfect! Here we go!

Ro: It’s got a bunch of these… These,
these, these, these, these!

Ro: And I gotta show this! Gotta, eh, oh!
Oh!
Ro: And then... Oh!
Max: Oh start, time! I was so fascinated!

Ro: Can anybody guess what that is? Max: That
was exciting to watch!
Max: I’m sure you guys are excited too!

Ro: What do you see? What are you feeling?
What do you think it is? Max: Ummm.

Max: I just want to say its a flower but…
It’s not!
Max: It’s a flower! It’s a flower?

Max: It’s a flower. It’s absolutely a
flower. Ro: Is your final guess a flower?

Max: I mean no! Why would I make that my final
guess? My final guess…

Max: It’s a cell tower, that looks like
a tree! Cell Tower?

Ro: Wait, wait, oh! I mean that’s closer!
Max: It’s a tower?

Max: I’m just gonna go for that because…
Ro: It’s a cell tower?

Max: That was all in that one sheet, Cell
Tower Disguised as a Tree!

Max: What was it Ro? Ro: That was the Seattle
Space Needle!

Max: Oh my gosh! Whoa! You definitely… I
mean now I see it!

Max: What a specific thing! And of course,
it’s something you saw a lot! Yeah!
Ro: Dun-dun-dun-dun-dun-dun, dun-dun-dun-dun-dun!

Max: I believe! We’re 4 out of 10, so I think that…
Alright you close your eyes?
Max: Close your eyes! Ro: Oh!
Max: Wow…
Ro: Circle, uh, oh, body! Person! Yes!
Ro: Another, it could be a party!
Ro: Hmmmm, little circle, with legs!
Ro: Hamster! No, it’s bigger!
Ro: 5 Seconds! Max: Uhhh… Ro: 4, 3, 2, 1! Max: I don't... Yeah...
Ro: Wow! Max! Wow! These are getting better!

Max: You know what it is right now! Ro: Look
at this! Max: You know what it is!

Ro: I feel like I can guess what this is!
Max: You can?

Ro: OK, there’s 2 people, and they’re
chasing a dog!
Ro: Dog park!

Max: No, no… They’re, they’re not, it’s
us… And, and, it’s us playing this challenge.

Max: So they’re sitting on… What looks
like the bench we’re sitting on.

Max: And um… And there’s a dog. Ro: Is
this Cookie!?

Max: That’s Cookie. Cookie doesn’t look
to good in this photo, but…
Ro: Oh my gosh this is beautiful!

Max: Let’s do it! Ro: Let’s get some points!
Let’s get some points!

Max: Go! Ro: Alright, I’m gonna start here,
and then here…

Ro: Doo-doo-doo-doo-doo! 1, 2, 3, 4… And
then 1 more!
Ro: Alright, now i gotta put the face on.

Ro: Uh, I gotta get this just right, uhhh… This
feels right, I’m feeling

Ro: like this is perfect placement. Alright,
yep, yep!
Ro: Um, ah, errr, errrr! Ah, Eee! Yeah!
Max: Time!

Max: Time! Ro: No wait! Max: Time wait, no
you’re good.
Ro: No, wait! Wait! Wait! Wait!
Ro: OK!

Ro: Oh my goodness! Max: I mean it’s great
though, it’s great!

Ro: In my mind, this is all positioned correctly!
Max: Of course!
Max: It’s a bunny, or a rabbit!

Max: Is that right? It’s not a bunny or
a rabbit? No!?

Max: Is that a dog? It’s not Cookie, is
it Cookie? It’s Cookie!
Max: It’s Cookie!? It’s Cookie! Yay!

Ro: You got it! That’s a point! Max: I thought
I had that right away, When I saw

Max: those ears I thought that was, that was
a bunny, but it’s, it’s Cookie!
Ro: Choose your word Max!

Ro: I’m not looking! Max: That’s right!
This is my favorite let's go!
Max: Woo!

in his hand!

Ro: Ooh a cheerleader! Oh, wait, wait there’s

Ro: Oh we’re getting pretty detailed here!
What are these little thingy

Max: Person!

things there. There’s a lot of separate things!

Yes! Ro: Yes!

you know? Maybe he got 3
